description: This file defines API routes related to badges in a FastAPI application, including endpoints to list all badges and current user's badges, utilizing SQLAlchemy ORM for database access.

methods.name: list[BadgeResponse] list_badges(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a list of all badge definitions.

methods.name: list[UserBadgeResponse] list_my_badges(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve badges earned by the current user.

ctags.name: list_badges
ctags.pattern: /^def list_badges(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user)) -> lis/
